Created by Mengkare and powered by a shard of the _Orb of Gold Dragonkind_, this construct is made of sculpted crystal draped in a beautiful gold filigree frame. **[Recall Knowledge - Construct](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4)): DC 54 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 52 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 49 [Dragonshard Guardian](/Monsters.aspx?ID=489) **Source** [Pathfinder #150: Broken Promises](/Sources.aspx?ID=15) pg. 79 **Perception** +39; darkvision, [_true seeing_](/Spells.aspx?ID=344) **Languages** **Skills** [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +30 **Str** +10 **Dex** +8 **Con** +9 **Int** -5 **Wis** +7 **Cha** -5 --- **AC** 48 **Fort** +39 **Ref** +36 **Will** +33 **HP** 430 **Immunities** bleed, death effects, disease, doomed, drained, fatigued, healing, mental, necromancy, nonlethal attacks, paralyzed, poison, sickened, unconscious **Resistances** fire 24, physical 24 (except bludgeoning adamantine) **Weaknesses** sonic 24 **Frightful Presence** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) 90 feet, DC 42
**Reverberating Revenge** ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) **Trigger** The dragonshard guardian takes cold, fire, electricity, or sonic damage from a non-dragonshard guardian source; **Effect** The dragonshard guardian’s body absorbs the energy entirely, preventing the damage from harming the construct. Its body reverberates and transforms the absorbed energy before projecting it outward in a 60-foot burst. Each creature within the burst takes an amount of fire damage equal to the amount of energy damage absorbed by the triggering attack, including any damage resisted by the guardian’s resistances and additional damage from its weakness (DC 45 basic Reflex save). This fire damage doesn’t harm objects or constructs. --- **Speed** 30 feet **Melee** jaws +41 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 15 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 6d10+8 piercing plus 2d10 persistent bleed **Melee** claw +41 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 9d6+8 slashing **Breath Weapon** The construct breathes in one of two ways, then can’t use Breath Weapon again for 1d4 rounds.
  • **Flame** ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) A blast of flame deals 15d10 fire damage to all creatures in a 60-foot cone (DC 45 basic Reflex save). This fire damage does not harm objects or constructs.
  • **Weakening Gas** ([arcane](/Traits.aspx?ID=11), [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) A cloud of gold-flecked gas forces each creature in a 60-foot cone to attempt a DC 45 Fortitude save; the effect lasts 1 minute.
    **Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
    **Success** The creature is [enfeebled 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13).
    **Failure** The creature is [enfeebled 5](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13).
    **Critical Failure** The creature is [enfeebled 8](/Conditions.aspx?ID=13).
Other Guardians Similar guardians may exist, created from fragments of other destroyed artifacts. These guardians should be unique in appearance, each with their own special abilities and purposes, but you can use the guardian presented here as inspiration for creating more.
name: Dragonshard Guardian
